messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats: - Run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. - Won more votes than Labour in the last elections. - Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. - Can deliver real change across Britain today.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives - Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS. Conservatives telling you?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fiona Martin supports fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket with Nick Clegg’s tax plan which means no tax on the first £10,000 you earn, cutting most tax bills by £700.

mentions.candidate: Fiona Martin has a long and distinguished record of public and voluntary service in the Louth & Horncastle constituency area.

issues.economy: Real savings identified to pledge fairer taxes.
issues.health: Opposes Conservative policies on NHS privatization and dismantling NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fiona believes in working with local people to improve facilities and services and could do so much more if elected to the Westminster Parliament as part of a larger Lib Dem team.

politicalExperience.role: Councillor at East Lindsey District Council and leader of the Liberal Democrat group there.

quotes.text: We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality [is it the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller.
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

images.caption: Fiona Martin with Nick Clegg and Vince Cable, and interacting with a possible constituent.
